# metrics

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of custom metrics values.

## Declaration

```swift
var metrics: [MetricsKey : any Sendable]
```

## Getting the properties

- **itemCount**: The number of items processed so far.
- **origin**: A description of the event’s origin.
- **totalItemCount**: The total number of items being processed.

items.description: The number of items processed so far.
items.name: itemCount

items.description: A description of the event’s origin.

items.description: The total number of items being processed.
